alert.note: Alert for Perry; Stone (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 13 at 12:56PM CDT until July 13 at 4:30PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM CDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Portions of southwest Alabama, including the following county, Washington. Portions of southeast Mississippi, including the following counties, George, Greene, Perry and Stone. * WHEN...Until 200 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1254 PM CDT, Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 2 and 4 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Leakesville, Beaumont, McLain, Bradley, Neely, Hillman, Byrd, Jonathan, Leaf, Merrill, Little Creek, Bexley, Progress, Avent, Dueitt, Avera, Clark, Pisgah, Rounsaville and Old Avera. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
